text: Pieve del Cairo is a comune in the Province of Pavia in the Lombardy region in Italy. It is about 60 km southwest of Milan and about 30 km southwest of Pavia. As of 31 December 2004, 2,179 people lived there. It has an area of 25.5 kmÂ².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Pieve del Cairo is next to these municipalities of Ferrera Erbognone, Galliavola, Gambarana, Isola Sant'Antonio, Mede, Mezzana Bigli, and Villa Biscossi. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey
